title: House Marchese California King Bed

Supremely contemporary, the headboard is upholstered with quality faux leather with cohesive features which will pulls the entire design together. Elegant silhouettes, ornamental stitching, and gilded wooden trimming on each exquisitely crafted piece in this collection will create a regal ambiance in your home.

description:

Clean lines and a rustic brown finish make this collection one to desire. The matching case goods offer plenty of storage options to suit your needs.
